conclusion: Need to analyze waveforms and particle's vibration image to determine wave direction and speed
Waveform at t=2s shows displacement y of particle at x=2m
Displacement y is positive, indicating particle is moving to the right
Particle moving to the right implies wave is propagating to the left
Wave speed v is given by formula v = λ/T
Wavelength λ is distance between two consecutive peaks or troughs
Period T is time for wave to complete one cycle
Direction of wave propagation is to the left, wave speed is 1m/s
